name: AccountNumber
definition: Unique identifier for the deposit account assigned by the core banking system.

name: AccountHolderName
definition: Full legal name of the primary account holder as registered in the bank's records.

name: AccountHolderID
definition: Unique internal customer identifier linking the account to the customer profile.

name: AccountCurrency
definition: The ISO 4217 currency code representing the denomination of the deposit account.

name: CurrentBalance
definition: The total amount of funds currently present in the account, including uncleared funds.

name: AvailableBalance
definition: The amount of funds in the account that is immediately available for withdrawal or transfer.

name: OpenDate
definition: The date on which the deposit account was formally opened and activated.

name: Status
definition: Current operational status of the account (e.g., Active, Dormant, Closed, Frozen).

name: ProductCode
definition: Internal code identifying the specific deposit product type (e.g., SavPlus, CheckStd).

name: InterestRate
definition: The annual percentage rate (APR) currently applied to the account balance for interest calculation.

name: InterestAccruedYTD
definition: Total interest earned by the account holder during the current calendar year.

name: OverdraftLimit
definition: The maximum negative balance allowed on the account before overdraft fees are incurred or transactions rejected.

name: BranchCode
definition: Identifier for the physical bank branch where the account is domiciled.

name: LastTransactionDate
definition: The date of the most recent financial activity (debit or credit) on the account.

name: StatementFrequency
definition: The schedule on which account statements are generated and sent to the customer (e.g., Monthly, Quarterly).

name: AccountTitle
definition: The specific designation or nickname given to the account by the customer (e.g., 'Vacation Fund').

name: JointAccountIndicator
definition: Boolean flag indicating whether the account is held by more than one individual.

name: TaxWithholdingStatus
definition: Indicator of whether the account is subject to backup tax withholding regulations.

name: LienAmount
definition: The portion of the account balance that is currently held as collateral or under legal hold.

name: ClosureReason
definition: The recorded reason for the closure of the account, if applicable.

name: AverageMonthlyBalance
definition: The calculated average balance of the account over the preceding 30-day period.

name: FacilityID
definition: Unique identifier for the credit facility agreement.

name: BorrowerName
definition: Legal name of the entity or individual to whom the facility is granted.

name: FacilityType
definition: Classification of the credit facility (e.g., Revolving Credit, Term Loan, Letter of Credit).

name: CommittedAmount
definition: The total amount of funds the bank has committed to lend under the facility agreement.

name: UncommittedAmount
definition: The portion of the facility that is available but can be withdrawn by the bank at its discretion.

name: Currency
definition: The base currency in which the facility limits and usage are denominated.

name: EffectiveDate
definition: The date on which the facility agreement becomes active and funds can be drawn.

name: ExpiryDate
definition: The final date on which the facility is available for drawing; typically the maturity date.

name: ReviewDate
definition: The scheduled date for the periodic credit review of the facility and borrower.

name: RiskRating
definition: Internal credit risk grade assigned to the facility based on borrower probability of default.

name: UtilizationAmount
definition: The current total outstanding balance drawn against the facility.

name: AvailableHeadroom
definition: The remaining amount that can be drawn from the facility (Committed - Utilization).

name: SyndicatedFlag
definition: Indicates if the facility is part of a syndicated loan involving multiple lenders.

name: LeadArranger
definition: Name of the bank responsible for organizing the syndicated facility.

name: CovenantStatus
definition: Current compliance status regarding financial covenants stipulated in the agreement.

name: CollateralLinkID
definition: Reference ID to the collateral pool securing this specific facility.

name: InterestBaseRate
definition: The benchmark rate (e.g., SOFR, LIBOR) used as the basis for interest calculation.

name: MarginSpread
definition: The additional percentage points added to the base rate to determine the final interest rate.

name: FacilityFee
definition: Annual fee charged for the availability of the credit facility, regardless of utilization.

name: GoverningLaw
definition: The legal jurisdiction under whose laws the facility agreement is enforced.

name: CrossDefaultClause
definition: Boolean indicating if a default on other obligations triggers a default on this facility.

name: LoanID
definition: Unique identifier for the specific loan account.

name: BorrowerID
definition: Unique customer identifier for the borrower.

name: LoanAmount
definition: The initial principal amount disbursed to the borrower.

name: OutstandingPrincipal
definition: The remaining principal amount that has not yet been repaid.

name: InterestType
definition: Specifies if the interest rate is Fixed or Floating/Variable.

name: CurrentInterestRate
definition: The specific interest rate currently being applied to the outstanding principal.

name: TermMonths
definition: The duration of the loan repayment period in months.

name: DisbursementDate
definition: The date on which the loan funds were released to the borrower.

name: MaturityDate
definition: The final deadline for the full repayment of the loan principal and interest.

name: RepaymentFrequency
definition: The interval at which loan payments are due (e.g., Monthly, Bi-weekly).

name: NextPaymentDate
definition: The due date for the upcoming scheduled loan payment.

name: ArrearsAmount
definition: The total amount of overdue payments currently outstanding.

name: DaysPastDue
definition: The number of days the loan account has been in delinquency status.

name: LoanPurpose
definition: The stated reason for the loan (e.g., Mortgage, Auto, Personal, Working Capital).

name: AmortizationType
definition: The method used to calculate schedule payments (e.g., Straight-line, Declining Balance).

name: GuarantorName
definition: Name of the individual or entity guaranteeing the loan repayment.

name: OriginationFee
definition: Fee charged by the lender for processing the new loan application.

name: PrepaymentPenalty
definition: The fee structure applied if the borrower pays off the loan before maturity.

name: SecuritizationStatus
definition: Indicates if the loan has been packaged into a security and sold to investors.

name: RestructuredFlag
definition: Indicates if the terms of the loan have been modified due to borrower financial distress.

name: CreditScoreAtOrigination
definition: The borrower's credit score at the time the loan was approved.

name: PartyID
definition: Unique immutable identifier for the party (individual or organization).

name: FullName
definition: The complete legal name of the party.

name: ShortName
definition: An abbreviated or trading name used by the party.

name: PartyType
definition: Classification of the party (e.g., Individual, Corporation, Trust, Government).

name: TaxID
definition: Government-issued tax identification number (e.g., SSN, EIN, VAT).

name: DateOfBirthOrIncorporation
definition: The date an individual was born or a company was legally formed.

name: CountryOfResidence
definition: The primary country where the party legally resides or is domiciled.

name: AddressLine1
definition: Building number and street name of the registered address.

name: City
definition: City or town of the registered address.

name: PostalCode
definition: Postal or ZIP code of the registered address.

name: EmailAddress
definition: Primary electronic mail contact address.

name: PhoneNumber
definition: Primary telephone contact number including country code.

name: KYCStatus
definition: Current status of Know Your Customer (KYC) verification (e.g., Verified, Pending, Expired).

name: RiskCategory
definition: Anti-Money Laundering (AML) risk classification (e.g., Low, Medium, High).

name: PEPStatus
definition: Indicates if the party is considered a Politically Exposed Person.

name: RelationshipManager
definition: Name of the bank employee responsible for managing the relationship.

name: Sector
definition: Industry sector classification code (e.g., NAICS, SIC) for corporate parties.

name: LegalForm
definition: The legal structure of the organization (e.g., LLC, Plc, GmbH).

name: ParentCompanyID
definition: Identifier of the parent company if the party is a subsidiary.

name: SourceOfWealth
definition: Description of the origin of the party's accumulated wealth.

name: BlacklistStatus
definition: Indicates if the party appears on any internal or external sanctions lists.

name: TransactionID
definition: Unique identifier for the individual financial transaction.

name: TransactionType
definition: Categorization of the transaction (e.g., Wire, ACH, ATM, POS).

name: BookingDate
definition: The date the transaction was posted to the account ledger.

name: ValueDate
definition: The date on which the funds become effective for interest calculation.

name: Amount
definition: The numerical value of the transaction.

name: Currency
definition: The currency in which the transaction amount is denominated.

name: DebitorAccount
definition: The account number from which funds are being debited.

name: CreditorAccount
definition: The account number to which funds are being credited.

name: DebitorName
definition: Name of the party sending the funds.

name: CreditorName
definition: Name of the party receiving the funds.

name: ExchangeRate
definition: The rate applied if the transaction involves currency conversion.

name: ReferenceString
definition: The description or reference text accompanying the transaction.

name: Channel
definition: The medium through which the transaction was initiated (e.g., Mobile App, Branch, Online).

name: MerchantCategoryCode
definition: Four-digit number listed in ISO 18245 for retail financial services.

name: TransactionStatus
definition: Current processing state (e.g., Pending, Completed, Failed, Reversed).

name: FeeAmount
definition: Any service charge applied directly to this transaction.

name: BatchID
definition: Identifier for the batch file if the transaction was processed in bulk.

name: AuthorizationCode
definition: Code generated by the issuing bank approving the transaction.

name: InitiatorID
definition: User ID or System ID that initiated the transaction request.

name: GeoLocation
definition: Latitude and Longitude coordinates where the transaction took place.

name: FraudScore
definition: Real-time risk score assigned by the fraud detection engine.
